publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4880 John Park: Rok Apprentice Awardsâ€”That the Parliament notes the annual apprentice awards ceremony being held by Rok Group in Dunkeld on 21 September 2009; congratulates the 160 apprentices attending the ceremony who have completed their apprenticeships with the company; welcomes the commitment that has been shown to supporting and developing the apprentices to achieve their full potential and learn a diverse range of trades that are vital to the future of the building and maintenance sector in Scotland; is pleased that high profile companies such as Rok are recognising the importance of continuing to train apprentices and take on redundant apprentices to develop the skilled workforce of the future, and wishes all the successful apprentices well for their future careers.

S3M-4880 Rok Apprentice Awards (lodged on 18 September 2009) David Stewart*, Bob Doris*, David Whitton*, James Kelly*, Kenneth Gibson*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Ken Macintosh*, Des McNulty*, Jackie Baillie*, Sandra White*, Charlie Gordon*, Mary Mulligan*, Jim Tolson*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Claire Baker*
S3M-4880 Rok Apprentice Awards (lodged on 18 September 2009) Elaine Smith*, Trish Godman*, Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-4880 Rok Apprentice Awards (lodged on 18 September 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Mr Frank McAveety*
S3M-4880 Rok Apprentice Awards (lodged on 18 September 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-4880 Rok Apprentice Awards (lodged on 18 September 2009) Marlyn Glen*, Angela Constance*, Rhoda Grant*
S3M-4880 Rok Apprentice Awards (lodged on 18 September 2009) Bill Kidd*
S3M-4880 Rok Apprentice Awards (lodged on 18 September 2009) Lewis Macdonald*
